text_logic_form: The length of the line $JL$ is $27$ units.
The length of the line $BL$ is $9$ units.
The length of the line $JK$ is $18$ units.
Find the length of the line $JA$.

diagram_logic_form: Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $J$ and $K$.
Point $B$ lies on the line connecting $J$ and $L$.
line_instances: The lines $AB$ and $KL$ are also present.
